item.description:
On Saturday, July 17, 2010 discover some great home decorating ideas during the ?South End Decorating Tour? at the Boston Center for Adult Education (BCAE). The tour will begin at the BCAE and will explore various unique home furnishing stores in the South End led by tour guide and instructor, Mary Chase. Mary will introduce students to a blend of furniture and home accessories including: antique Asian pieces, exotic Brazilian finds, cutting edge Dutch work from some of the leading designers as well as interesting consignment finds and boutiques. At the end of the tour, students can enjoy lunch at one of the South Ends restaurants (lunch is not included). Gain decorating ideas and learn while getting inspired by some of the best local furniture stores in the South End! This one session workshop will be held on Saturday, July 17, 2010 from 10:00am to 2:00pm. The cost is $35.00 for nonmembers and $30.00 for members.Registration is necessary. Please visit www.bcae.org or call the BCAE at 617-267-4430.


I won't be able to attend but it sounds fun.

group.name: Greater Boston Jewelry Design and DIY Crafts Meetup Group

item.name: South End Decorating Tour at the Boston Center for Adult Education (BCAE).
